description: This is a blueprint for vendor estimate form.

estimateNumber.instruction: The unique identifier or reference number for estimate.

estimateDate.instruction: The date of this estimate was made.

scopeOfWork.instruction: Extract matched work item and price in array. The foramt should be "work item - price". For example, ["Replace to Torn Shingles - 800", "Repair Structural Beams - 5000"].

FirstVendorEstimate.instruction: The estimate information from the first vendor.

SecondVendorEstimate.instruction: The estimate information from the second vendor.
